name: Dungeon Without Dragons v2
description:
• A turn-based game whose goal is simply to kill all opponents
Character:
  • To control the character, click on the hero and you'll see where you can go
Attack:
  1. Click on the character
  2. The enemy will be outlined
  3. Click on the enemy
HP Potion:
  1. Сome to the potion
  2. Click on the potion
